Speech.Name: Sign
Speech.Content: (There's a stone with a strange symbol on it.)

Speech.Name: Sign
Speech.Content: (Someone has inscribed a message. Read it?)

Speech.Name: Sign
Speech.Content: You can do more than you give credit for.

Speech.Name: Sign
Speech.Content: Dust off your shoulders, and go for it.

Speech.Name: Sign
Speech.Content: (There are more pressing matters at hand.)
